attributes.action: Prevent cruelty to haemavorous beings (vampires) and to protect their rights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Firstly, this is not a joke. I understand that you have more important issues to adress, and the large majority of people do not even believe in the existence of vampires. But I have a theory, please read it. here is the link, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Talk:Vampire#How_to_fight_vampires

It is under the heading: Vampires are haemavores, I have a perfectly logical and scientific explanation, etc. and it is signed as ~Fraz~, aka myself.

I simply ask the consideration of a law or civil rights act against the discrimination, and cruelty towards these most wonderful people, who suffer with this virus. or at least a programme designed to educate British citizens of the reality, and cruelty towards what we ignorantly refer to as "vampires". Please sign this if you agree with fair treatment to all.
